name: Rigid Body Rat King
description:
A / D to roll left / right

W to jump

Hold S to compress rat stack

Roll up rats to stack them.

Stack rats high enough to reach the habitrail pipe.

Rigid Body Rat King Is a puzzle game about stacking rats high enough to reach the entrance to the fabled City of Ratropolis, an infinite network of habitrails filled with disgusting things to eat.

Clap your hands with glee as you guide the Rat King -who isn't really a rigid body- in his quest to deliver every rat he can to Ratropolis!

Marvel at the whopping TWO very short stages I managed to finish before the end of Wizardjam! This is more like a proof-of-proof-of-concept than anything else.
